title: The strange case of Dr Cherry and Mr Lime
author: Lurap Litmur
content: Nothing is what it seems in the pantry.

comments.text: This is a very interesting post... I wish I had read it.

title: A random blog post you should never check out
author: Lurap Litmur
content: It is so interesting it might kill you dead.

title: Another random post
author: Lurap Litmur
content: Have you heard about flying potatoes? They are not what you may think... they are not innocuous either, but rather nefarious, if you ask me. Oh, you didn't ask me? I am so sorry. Beware of the flying potatoes in any case, son.

comments.text: You talk nonsense, man, you just wasted my time... I HATE YOU!!!!
You should set your potatoes free. There's no point watching every peel they shed.

title: Letucce Go Now
author: Lurap Litmur
content: You know you're onto something when you find a salad that is both healthy and tasty... Lettuce Go Now is the first salad-only fast food service for all the healthy eaters out there.
